content: 1HoDLCLUB Litecoin CasinoWelcome everyone to the Official 1HoDLCLUB Golden Brass Litecoin poker Chips Sale!this is the official sale of 1HoDLCLUB Golden Brass Litecoin poker chips, this sale is dedicated to solo chips, chips are serialized from LBC001 to LBC200.Each chips is serialized "LBC..."[which means Litecoin Brass Chips].Solo chips means that there are no rolls, whether you take 10 or 21 chips you will have 10 or 21 solo chips in air tites.All the chips have the denomination 0.1 LTC and are sold loaded [Of course they will be loaded once they reach the hands of their new owners]Since this is the official sale, there is no limit on the purchase of chips per member. Serial Numbers cannot be choose, first arrived, first served.1HoDLCLUB Golden Brass Litecoin Poker chipsMintage : 190 - 190 SOLD / 0 AVAILABLEMaterial : Brass - Gold platedSize : 39mmThickness : 3.2mmWeight : 1ozDenomination : 0.1 LTC Serial : LBC001 to LBC200Price : 35$ per chip + 0.1 LTC loading per chip + shipping costReference list :Code:Serial           BTC Address1
